title: Put a smile on your face! You've just found the right place!
posting_body: ['Stonecreek on the Green', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '3974 Annistown Rd', 'Snellville, GA 30039', 'show contact info', 'Stonecreek on the Green is proudly managed by Peak Living.', 'At Peak Living, our mission is to lead the property management industry by creating communities where our residents love to live and our employees love to work.', 'We aim to offer our residents technology to help streamline their lives - from digital lease signing to online work order submission and online payments, we offer residents the flexibility that only the most advanced technology can provide.', 'We empower our employees to lead with confidence and provide exceptional customer service by modeling our core values - Professionalism, Integrity, Accountability, Persistence, Adaptability, and Teamwork.', 'Bedrooms: 2 |  Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1161 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $2109 - $2421/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ Additional Storage', '❖ Controlled Access', '❖ Fitness Center with Free Weights', '❖ Gazebo', '❖ Grills', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Playground', '❖ Resident Business Center', '❖ Beautiful Park-like Setting', '❖ Car Care Center', '❖ Convenient to Shopping, Dining & Entertainment', '❖ Eat-in Kitchen with Built-In Lazy Susan', '❖ Great Neighbors', '❖ Handicap Friendly', '❖ Resort-Style Pool', 'This Unit Comes With:', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Fireplace in Select Units', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Kitchen', '❖ Laundry Rooms', '❖ Range', '❖ Window Coverings', "❖ 9' Ceilings with Crown Molding", '❖ Balcony in Select Units', '❖ Breakfast Bar', '❖ Huge Garden Tubs with Ceramic Tile', '❖ Scenic Views in Select Units', '❖ Shower/Roman Tubs', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sunrooms in Every Apartment Home', '❖ Walk -In Laundry Room with Storage Space', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Lease-Length: 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '94F67716D8EC437']
